entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:04 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Rain, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 2:46 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: E 46 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to rain this afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
